Title: Series: Galleria Imperiale di Firenze
Description: Holy Family with St Francis; a draped Virgin Mary, sitting under a tree, holding the naked Child in her lap; next to them Joseph, pulling down a branch of the tree, handing some dates to the Child with his other hand; St Francis kneeling next to the Family; in a forest. 1812 Etching in outline
Producer name: Print made by: Giovanni Paolo Lasinio
Curator's comments: Print after Correggio's Holy Family with St Francis, formerly in the church of San Francesco, Correggio, sent to Florence in 1649, now in the Galleria degli Uffizi, Florence. See Gould, 1976, p. 208-209 According to Mussini, the print is part of the volume "Galleria Imperiale di Firenze" published in 1812, where it appeared as plate number 5 in volume 1. See "Correggio Tradotto", 1995, p. 99.
Associated names: Representation of: St Francis of Assisi
Acquisition notes: From Richard Ford's collection of prints after Correggio (1837,0408.14 to 669), purchased from him through Colnaghi's, for £250.
